message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI. 

The paper describes a system that uses sentence classification and information retrieval techniques to generate multi-document biographies. This suggests that the paper could belong to several sub-categories in computer science, including Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), Machine Learning (cs.LG), and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI). Among these, cs.IR and cs.CL are the most likely categories, as they directly relate to the techniques used in the paper.
